bug.short_desc: segfault, GLib-GObject: invalid cast from 'GdkWaylandDisplay' to 'GdkX11Display'
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: With the latest update from koji on Fedora 25, I am getting a crash
$ chromium-browser ** Message: Remote error from secret service: org.freedesktop.Secret.Error.IsLocked: Cannot get secret of a locked object [13809:13835:0818/095941:ERROR:native_backend_libsecret.cc(517)] Unable to load secret itemCannot get secret of a locked object ** Message: Remote error from secret service: org.freedesktop.Secret.Error.IsLocked: Cannot get secret of a locked object [13809:13835:0818/095941:ERROR:native_backend_libsecret.cc(517)] Unable to load secret itemCannot get secret of a locked object [13809:13809:0818/095945:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(283)] GLib-GObject: invalid cast from 'GdkWaylandDisplay' to 'GdkX11Display' [13809:13809:0818/095945:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(283)] GLib-GObject: invalid cast from 'GdkWaylandDisplay' to 'GdkX11Display' [13809:13809:0818/095945:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(283)] GLib-GObject: invalid cast from 'GdkWaylandDisplay' to 'GdkX11Display' [13809:13809:0818/095945:ERROR:browser_main_loop.cc(283)] GLib-GObject: invalid cast from 'GdkWaylandDisplay' to 'GdkX11Display' Segmentation fault (core dumped)
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): chromium-52.0.2743.116-9.fc25.x86_64 chromium-libs-media-52.0.2743.116-9.fc25.x86_64 chromium-libs-52.0.2743.116-9.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. just update the chromium from updates-testing repo 2. run chromium-browser 3.
Actual results: segfault as given above
Expected results: should be running fine
Additional info:
After googling on this segfault found this solution working https://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=833342#10
After using for few pages I found the mouse pointer is not coming exactly on the hyperlinks or any widgets for click/selection, sometimes even I did not get to click on buttons.
Thank you for quick update. Its working fine :)
